actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend Public Law 90-503 (82 Stat. 853) to authorize construction, operation, and maintenance of facilities to deliver water to the city of Frederick, Okla., from the Mountain Park reclamation project.

summary.text: Authorizes the construction, operation, and maintenance of facilities to deliver water to the city of Frederick, Oklahoma, from the Mountain Park reclamation projects. Increases the previous authorization of appropriations by $3,200,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend Public Law 90-503 (82 Stat. 853) to authorize construction, operation, and maintenance of facilities to deliver water to the city of Frederick, Okla., from the Mountain Park reclamation project.
